post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 CPUSOFT Corporation Inc.

주소 Canada Ontario  
  Toronto North

홈페이지 www.cpusoft.com

회사소개 Professional Services Firm specialized in Technology, Engineering and Consulting ((Placement Agency)
)


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 Data warehouse analyst (Business Intelligence Expert)

고용형태 Permanent, Full Time  

모집기간  Start Date: 2003/02/01

급여 To be negotiated

근무지 Canada   Ontario Toronto North  


지원자격
학력 University or College Computer Science degree  

자격증 3 to 5 yrs Business Systems Analyst in a Business/IT Environment

경력 3 - 5 years

필요한기술 Operating Systems: Environment - Centralized, Environment - Distributed, MS Windows 95/98/NT/2000, Unix
Programming Languages: Object-Oriented programming languages
Applications: MS Project
Management Systems (erp or db): Data Warehouse, DB2, MS SQL Server, Oracle / PL-SQL / CASE / Developer 2000 / Ingres, Siebel, Sybase
Communication Protocols: WAN
Other: Data modelling, Object-Oriented design


기타 Work with Business Clients, understand their requirements and produce functional specification documentation. Work closely with the Transformation Programmers, QA Analysts and Business Clients to resolve requirements and specification issues. Dedicated to do business, data requirements and analysis. Develop extensive documentation on the requirements and functional specification for the Data Warehouse developers. Support of the Data Warehouse development team on understanding the requirements.


지원방법
지원방법 By E-mail  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 - -  

이메일 debra-lynn@cpusoft.com
post.title: Data warehouse analyst (Business Intelligence Expert)
